title: some validators are penalized while some are rewarded
body:
this is what happen on my  9 validators:
1. sometime are all good, rewarded
2. sometimes are all bad, penalized
3. sometimes a few are rewarded, the others are penalized
4. some validators receive assignment but have not submitted attestations

below are 4 cases just happened, try to find linkage between validator process and beacon node process:

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
case 1: no error, all submit fine
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
[2020-01-19 07:40:04]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=6 deposits=0 slot=68600
[2020-01-19 07:40:15]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0x7beb872c... slot=68601
[2020-01-19 07:40:16]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=6 deposits=0 slot=68601
[2020-01-19 07:40:27]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0xbb3dc445... slot=68602

[2020-01-19 07:35:24]  INFO validator: Submitted new attestations AggregatorIndices=[] AttesterIndices=[16802] BeaconBlockRoot=0x9b2bf1ce9d56 CommitteeIndex=4 Slot=68576 SourceEpoch=2142 SourceRoot=0x4b559ff48792 TargetEpoch=2143 TargetRoot=0x9b2bf1ce9d56

[2020-01-19 07:38:24]  INFO validator: Submitted new attestations AggregatorIndices=[16693] AttesterIndices=[16693] BeaconBlockRoot=0xf8c2dde2a720 CommitteeIndex=4 Slot=68591 SourceEpoch=2142 SourceRoot=0x4b559ff48792 TargetEpoch=2143 TargetRoot=0x43a7b79a0b05
```

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
[2020-01-19 07:41:36]  INFO validator: New assignment attesterSlot=68617 committeeIndex=3 epoch=2144 pubKey=0x876920f4a991 status=ACTIVE validatorIndex=16802

-- 9 validators, only 7 submit

[2020-01-19 07:47:48]  INFO validator: Submitted new attestations AggregatorIndices=[] AttesterIndices=[18153] BeaconBlockRoot=0x676efedeeb40 CommitteeIndex=5 Slot=68638 SourceEpoch=2143 SourceRoot=0x43a7b79a0b05 TargetEpoch=2144 TargetRoot=0xc62f14b20b94

[2020-01-19 07:47:36] ERROR blockchain: Could not receive attestation in chain service error=signature did not verify

[2020-01-19 07:48:00]  INFO validator: New Balance epoch=2144 newBalance=3.140166888 percentChange=-0.00003% prevBalance=3.14016787 pubKey=0x876920f4a9914d24
```
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
case 3: error
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
[2020-01-19 07:48:00]  INFO validator: New assignment attesterSlot=68666 committeeIndex=4 epoch=2145 pubKey=0xb97be494fb17 status=ACTIVE validatorIndex=17918

[2020-01-19 07:52:36] ERROR blockchain: Could not receive attestation in chain service error=signature did not verify

[2020-01-19 07:52:36]  INFO validator: Submitted new attestations AggregatorIndices=[] AttesterIndices=[16525] BeaconBlockRoot=0xc1a043a35352 CommitteeIndex=1 Slot=68662 SourceEpoch=2144 SourceRoot=0xc62f14b20b94 TargetEpoch=2145 TargetRoot=0x2f7e0ee25bc8

[2020-01-19 07:54:24]  INFO validator: New Balance epoch=2145 newBalance=3.145477056 percentChange=-0.00054% prevBalance=3.145494006 pubKey=0xb97be494fb170972
```
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
case 4: error
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
[2020-01-19 07:54:24]  INFO validator: New assignment attesterSlot=68701 committeeIndex=0 epoch=2146 pubKey=0xb050c50a366e status=ACTIVE validatorIndex=18030

[2020-01-19 07:59:36]  INFO validator: Submitted new attestations AggregatorIndices=[] AttesterIndices=[18153] BeaconBlockRoot=0xb6329cf5f030 CommitteeIndex=0 Slot=68697 SourceEpoch=2145 SourceRoot=0x2f7e0ee25bc8 TargetEpoch=2146 TargetRoot=0xdf64d554ce46

[2020-01-19 07:59:36] ERROR blockchain: Could not receive attestation in chain service error=signature did not verify

[2020-01-19 08:00:48]  INFO validator: New Balance epoch=2146 newBalance=3.147274905 percentChange=-0.00003% prevBalance=3.147275917 pubKey=0xb050c50a366ed989
```

as you can see, it is hard to link validator's output with beacon node's, and it is also hard to follow the info follow in validator, due to lack of a reference.

Learning from relational database Primary Key, I suggest adding public key as reference, in beacon node's error message relate to validator, also in "submit new attestion" message of validator. Public key is already shown in validator's "new assignment" and "new balance".

![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26490734/72897771-05485e80-3d23-11ea-8ec8-81cbeff5c5d0.png)
![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26490734/72897775-0a0d1280-3d23-11ea-927b-3e99f2d74683.png)
![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26490734/72897779-0c6f6c80-3d23-11ea-8d26-e922f253215c.png)

There has to be a bug with attestations since I was punished even though I was online. 
I hope the screenies help.

commit: {STABLE_GIT_COMMIT}. Built at: 2020-01-22T10:03:59-05:00

1 validator penalized (row 3), 11 rewarded.

![2 penalized 10 rewarded](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/59260174/72912981-762f4c80-3d0a-11ea-865c-8555f5423cbe.png)

We consider this resolved, looking at the validator leaderboard, almost everyone is a net positive across the board: https://beaconcha.in/validators/leaderboard. We can close this unless it is still a significant problem.
